applied_rule: horizontal [ > Player No Obstacle  ]  ->  [ PlayerBodyH  | PlayerHead1  |  ]
UP [ UP PlayerHead1 No Obstacle  ]  ->  [ PlayerBodyV  | PlayerHead2  |  ]
UP [ UP PlayerHead2 No Obstacle  ]  ->  [ PlayerBodyV  | PlayerHead3  |  ]
DOWN [ Player No Obstacle  ]  ->  [ PlayerBodyV PlayerHead1  ]
